import React from "react" import memesData from "../memesData" export default function Meme() { // const [memeImage, setMemeImage] = React.useState("http://i.imgflip.com/1bij.jpg") const [meme, setMeme] = React.useState() function getMemeImage(){ const memesArray = memesData.data.memes const randomNumber = Math.floor(Math.random() * memesArray.length) const url = memesArray [randomNumber].url setMemeImage(memesArray [randomNumber].url) console.log(url) } return (
) }
